item.title: A Rogue District Judge Forces a Confrontation with the Executive Branch
item.description: In the conflict over Planned Parenthood funding, the president is duty-bound to defend and implement federal law.

item.title: Online Alt-Right Accounts Aren’t Always What They Seem
item.description: Pro-America conservatives should take a great deal of ‘dissident’ content with a few caviar spoons of salt, so to speak.

item.title: Midyear Reckoning 2025
item.description: Despite cowardice and corruption, here are the year’s best movies so far.

item.title: GDP Is Not the Problem, Government Regulations Are
item.description: Rather than scrapping a proven economic measure, conservatives should focus on dismantling the regulatory barriers that hinder prosperity.

item.title: Hipster Tammany Hall Is Here
item.description: The new Democratic political machine has better branding and TikTok videos.
